title: Night city driving, almost stopped at a red light.
caption: Red car driving on a city street at night, almost stopped at a red light.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNight). The ego vehicle is almost stopped (average speed â‰ˆ 0.0 m/s). There are 30 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The red car is driving on a city street at night. There are several other cars on the road, some of them are parked on the side of the road. The street is well-lit with street lights and there are traffic lights at the intersection. The weather is clear and the visibility is good.
reasoning: The red car is driving at a very slow speed because it is almost stopped at a red traffic light. The driver is being cautious and following the traffic rules. The car is positioned in the right lane and there is enough space for other vehicles to pass. The driver is paying attention to the traffic signals and the surrounding environment to ensure safe driving.
